element.display: Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final result

target.display: Subsequent to being Final, the observation has been modified to correct an error in the test result.

The observation is complete and there are no further actions needed. Additional information such "released", "signed", etc. would be represented using Provenance which provides not only the act but also the actors and dates and other related data.
The existence of the observation is registered, but there is no result yet available.
